SEARCH
Package hms.manager

Class AppointmentManager

Object
AbstractManager<AppointmentRepository>
AppointmentManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IManager
public class AppointmentManager extends AbstractManager<AppointmentRepository>
The AppointmentManager class is responsible for managing appointments and related details.

It provides methods to get details, create appointments and update appointment details. The get methods can have different filters to get specific details, such as: - Appointments matching a SearchCriterion(s), which uses the appointment fields to filter - Whether a patient or doctor is free on a given timeslot, based on their appointments and busy timeslots - Which timeslots are free for a patient and doctor within a given timeslot, based on their appointments and busy timeslots

      public boolean isDoctorFree(String doctorId, Timeslot timeslot)
      Check if a patient is free on the given timeslot.
      Parameters:

      timeslot - The timeslot to check.

      timeslot - The timeslot to check.
      Returns:

    • getAllFreeTimeslots

      public Timeslot[] getAllFreeTimeslots(String patientId, String doctorId, Timeslot timeslot)
      Get all free timeslots for a patient and a doctor within a given timeslot.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor.
      timeslot - The timeslot to check. It is assumed that the timeslot is within the working hours of the doctor.
      Returns:
      An array of Timeslot objects representing the free timeslots within the given timeslot.

    • makeAppointment

      public Appointment makeAppointment(String patientId, String doctorId, Timeslot timeslot)
      Create a new appointment. The appointment is created with the status PENDING.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor.
      timeslot - The timeslot of the appointment.
      Returns:
      The created appointment, or null if the appointment could not be created.

    • resolveAppoinment

      public boolean resolveAppoinment(String id, String service, ArrayList<String> prescriptionIds, String notes)
      Finish an appointment. The appointment status is set to FINISHED.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the appointment.
      service - The service provided during the appointment.
      prescriptionIds - The IDs of the prescriptions given during the appointment.
      notes - Additional notes about the appointment.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment was successfully finished, false otherwise.

    • updateTimeslot

      public boolean updateTimeslot(String id, Timeslot timeslot)
      Update the timeslot of an appointment. The status of the appointment will be set to PENDING.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the appointment.
      timeslot - The new timeslot of the appointment.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • updateStatus

      public boolean updateStatus(String id, AppointmentStatus status)
      Update the status of an appointment. The current appointment status must be PENDING.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the appointment.
      status - The new status of the appointment. Must be one of: ACCEPTED, REJECTED, CANCELLED
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful, false otherwise.
